description:
Ace Your Math Placement Exam

Congratulations on your acceptance to college!

Many colleges require incoming students to take a math placement exam. It is important to prepare for this exam. Doing well will help qualify you to take courses in your major and facilitate a timely graduation. A good placement exam score may exempt you from developmental or remedial mathematics courses.

ACE YOUR MATH PLACEMENT provides a comprehensive review of pre-algebra and elementary algebra topics that frequently appear on placement exams. There are:

  • 2 practice exams
  • 15 step-by-step help videos
  • 60 practice problems

To use this course effectively, first test your skills by taking a practice exam in Section 2. See your results and then go to the Get Help sections. In Get Help try a problem on any of the topics and watch a help video that provides a step-by-step solution for that problem.

For more practice, each Get Help section provides a "Try another problem".

When you are ready, take a another practice exam in Section 19.
title: Ace Your Math Placement
